# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

I take the security of Portman seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please do not open a public issue. Instead, please report it directly to me via email.

**Email:** [notevenoddnerd@proton.me]

Please include:

- A description of the vulnerability.
- Steps to reproduce the issue.
- Any potential impact or exploit scenarios.

I will acknowledge your email as soon as possible and work on a fix. Thank you for helping this project not crash and burn!
